critical_findings.title: Significant Entity Coverage Gaps
critical_findings.description: 121 strategic entities (KPIs, targets) not tracked in action plan.
critical_findings.impact: Medium - Accountability and measurement gaps across strategic plan

proposals.description: Implement comprehensive monthly tracking dashboard for all strategic KPIs with automated alerts for off-track metrics.
proposals.rationale: Addresses the 121 unmatched strategic entities by ensuring all KPIs have explicit tracking mechanisms
proposals.expected_impact: Would improve entity match rate from 40.5% to 85%+ by adding systematic tracking for all strategic metrics

proposals.description: Conduct quarterly strategic alignment workshops to ensure all strategic entities are continuously matched with departmental action plans.
proposals.rationale: Facilitates ongoing dialogue and adjustment between strategy and execution teams, ensuring no strategic entity remains unmatched.
proposals.expected_impact: Gradually increases the match rate to 100% over a year, ensuring full accountability and measurement across the strategic plan.

proposals.description: Establish comprehensive KPI monitoring framework with monthly dashboards, automated data collection, and variance reporting for all strategic metrics.
proposals.rationale: Addresses systematic gap of 121 unmatched entities by creating explicit tracking mechanisms for all strategic metrics
proposals.expected_impact: Would improve entity match score from 40.5% to 85%+ by ensuring every strategic target has a corresponding measurement and tracking mechanism in the action plan

proposals.description: Conduct quarterly KPI alignment workshops with all department heads to ensure strategic KPIs are integrated into departmental action plans and individual performance objectives.
expected_kpis: 100% departmental action plans with integrated strategic KPIs
proposals.rationale: Directly tackles the accountability gaps and misalignments between strategic KPIs and departmental action plans
proposals.expected_impact: Enhances overall synchronization score to 75%+ by fostering a culture of accountability and ensuring strategic KPIs are actionable at all levels of the organization

proposals.description: Implement an organization-wide automated KPI tracking system that integrates with existing databases and software to ensure real-time tracking of strategic KPIs.
proposals.rationale: Eliminates manual tracking errors and delays in data collection, addressing the root cause of unmatched strategic entities
proposals.expected_impact: Expected to increase the entity match score to 90%+ by enabling precise and timely tracking of all strategic KPIs, thereby closing the tracking gaps identified
